@roblox/global/WorldDraw.drawLine.documentation: Draws a line in space, color values are from 0-1, lifetime of 0 means it will not be cleared

@roblox/global/WorldDraw.drawPoint.documentation: Draws a point in space, color values are from 0-1, lifetime of 0 means it will not be cleared

@roblox/global/WorldDraw.drawTriangle.documentation: Draws a triangle in space, color values are from 0-1, lifetime of 0 means it will not be cleared. This triangle is one-sided, so the order of the points matters.

@roblox/global/WorldDraw.clear.documentation: Clears all existing lines and points

@roblox/global/WorldDraw.clearAll.documentation: Clears all existing lines, points, and lights

@roblox/global/WorldDraw.spawnPointLight.documentation: Returns nil if the light failed to spawn

@roblox/globaltype/LuauPointLight.color.documentation: The RGB color of the light, values are from 0-1

@roblox/globaltype/LuauPointLight.radius.documentation: The range of the light in world units. This is the distance at which the light's intensity will be reduced to 0.
